Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA EDUARDO MADERO 1182, CITY OF BUENOS AIRES, 1172, Argentina

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Banco Macro SA is a financial institution and it provides standard banking products and services designed to suit individual needs. It has two categories of customers, retail customers, which include individuals and entrepreneurs, and corporate customers, which include small, medium, and large companies and corporations. In addition, it provides services to four provincial governments. The firm generates most of its revenue from Argentina.
